title: Orange nut cake
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon orange zest', '75ml fresh orange juice', 'boiling water', '2 tablespoons melted butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '250g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '200g caster sugar', '50g chopped walnuts']
